Detailed Description

This file provides reader/writer locks.

Revision
73845

Define Documentation

#define CVMX_RWLOCK_READ_INC   0x2
#define CVMX_RWLOCK_WRITE_FLAG   0x1

Function Documentation

static void cvmx_rwlock_wp_init ( cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t *  lock  )  [inline, static]

Initialize a reader/writer lock.

This must be done by a single core before used.

Parameters:
lock pointer to rwlock structure
static void cvmx_rwlock_wp_read_lock ( cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t *  lock  )  [inline, static]

Perform a reader lock.

If a writer is pending, this will wait for that writer to complete before locking.

NOTE: Each thread/process must only lock any rwlock once, or else a deadlock may result.

Parameters:
lock pointer to rwlock structure
static void cvmx_rwlock_wp_read_unlock ( cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t *  lock  )  [inline, static]

Perform a reader unlock.

Parameters:
lock pointer to rwlock structure
static void cvmx_rwlock_wp_write_lock ( cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t *  lock  )  [inline, static]

Perform a writer lock.

Any readers that attempt to get a lock while there are any pending write locks will wait until all writers have completed. Starvation of readers by writers is possible and must be avoided by the application.

Parameters:
lock pointer to rwlock structure
static void cvmx_rwlock_wp_write_unlock ( cvmx_rwlock_wp_lock_t *  lock  )  [inline, static]

Perform a writer unlock.

Parameters:
lock pointer to rwlock structure
